content.title: RISK DISCLOSURE STATEMENT
content.warning: WARNING: Trading in financial instruments involves risk. You should not invest unless you understand the risks and can afford to lose your money.
sections:
1. GENERAL RISKS:
- Capital at risk: You may lose some or all of your investment
- Past performance is not a reliable indicator of future results
- Market volatility: Prices can go down as well as up
- Liquidity risk: You may not be able to sell when you want
- Currency risk: If investing in foreign assets, exchange rate fluctuations affect value

2. SPECIFIC INVESTMENT RISKS:

[IF EQUITIES]:
- Share prices can be volatile
- Company may fail or be delisted
- Dividends not guaranteed
- Shareholder rights may be limited

[IF BONDS]:
- Interest rate risk: Bond prices fall when rates rise
- Credit risk: Issuer may default
- Inflation risk: Returns may not keep pace with inflation

[IF DERIVATIVES/CFDs]:
- HIGH RISK: You can lose more than your initial investment
- Leverage magnifies both gains and losses
- Margin calls: You may be required to deposit additional funds
- Fast-moving markets can result in rapid losses
- CFDs are complex instruments - 70-80% of retail investors lose money

[IF CRYPTOCURRENCIES]:
- VERY HIGH RISK: Extremely volatile and speculative
- No regulatory protection
- May lose all your investment
- Hacking and fraud risk
- Tax treatment unclear

[IF FUNDS]:
- Fund value can fall as well as rise
- Dilution impact from large inflows/outflows
- Manager risk: Performance depends on fund manager
- Charges reduce returns
3. TAX: Tax treatment depends on individual circumstances and may change. Seek independent tax advice.
4. NO ADVICE: [IF EXECUTION-ONLY: We do not provide investment advice. You make your own decisions.] [IF ADVISED: This is a personal recommendation based on your circumstances.]
5. COMPLAINTS: If you have a complaint, contact [COMPLAINTS_EMAIL]. If not resolved, you may refer to Financial Ombudsman Service (www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk).

6. COMPENSATION: We are covered by Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS). If we fail, you may be entitled to compensation up to £85,000 (investments) or £50,000 (investment advice). Details: www.fscs.org.uk

7. ACKNOWLEDGEMENT:
I confirm:
☐ I have read and understood this Risk Disclosure
☐ I understand I may lose money
☐ I can afford to lose the money I am investing
☐ [IF HIGH RISK: I understand this is a high-risk investment not suitable for most investors]

Signature: _______________  Date: _______________
content.fca_requirements:
Under COBS:
- Risk warnings must be clear, fair, and not misleading
- Prominent warnings for high-risk products
- CFD warning: '70-80% of retail investors lose money'
- Appropriateness/suitability assessment for complex products
- Enhanced warnings for retail clients
